title: shenrathini mILAthu
sahitya:
shenradini mILAdu mUDarE nIr eppozhudum sherAdaiyE eNNi eNNi
anupallavi  konrazhikkum kavalai enum kuzhiyil vIzhndu kumaiyAdIr sheradinai kurittal vENDA
caraNam  inru pudidAi pirandOm enru nIvIr eNNamadil tiNNamura ishaittuk-koNDu
tinru viLaiyADi inbuTrirundu vAzhvIr tImaiyelAm azhindupOm tirumbivArA
